font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 没有感染力的： impassively matter-of-fact, as in style, behavior, or expression
【例】 a deadpan comedy
【近】 catatonic, expressionless, impassive, inexpressive, stolid, vacant
【反】 demonstrative, expressive 有表现力的
【记】 dead pan
